channel.title: Adding animation to Items
channel.description:
I have noticed that there are quite a few objects and items that should have this little reacuring animation Like the Fire Cape or the Magic Tree hell even the fountains at still almost like there frozen so dose anyone know how to fix this i am sure it cant be that hard
Is this Client or Server side?
Thanks in advanced for the helpz

item.title: Adding animation to Items
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

so then the amazing low memory Moparscape Client is the reason why my Cape and Tree and froze… i guess thats ok thanks for answering my question!

Rep++ for u!

Read full topic

Yes, client-sided, but I’m not sure how.
